Green_Bay.Bellin College:
Bellin College is a private nursing school and graduate school of sciences located in Bellevue, Wisconsin, a suburb of Green Bay, Wisconsin.
Bellin College is accredited by the Higher Learning Commission of the North Central Association of Colleges and Schools (HLC).
